Export.zv: Cache for UNIX (Red Hat Enterprise Linux for x86-64) 2014.1.3 (Build 775)

Method.name: OnPageBODY
Method.Implementation:
Write "" Write !,"" Do ..WriteTitlePane("@Ensemble:ASTMManagerCodeTable@Ensemble ASTM Code Table") Write !,"
" Write !,!,"
" Write "ASTM Code Table Definition is displayed below:" Write "
" Write !,"
",! Write ! #Include EnsEDIASTM set ct=%request.Get("CT") set category=$p(ct,":",2) set secondary=$p(ct,":",3) If ((category'="")&&(secondary'="")) { set description=..EscapeHTML($get($$$vaSchemaDescGbl(category,"CT",secondary))) if $data($$$vaSchemaGbl(category,"CT",secondary))=0 { write ""_ct_" Definition does not exist!",! quit } } Else { Quit } Write !,!,"",! Write !,"",! Write ! set type=$get($$$vaSchemaGbl(category,"CT",secondary)) set annotate=$case(type, 1:"user", 2:"ASTM", 3:"ASTM and user", 4:"no longer used", 5:"replaced", 6:"user group/national defined", :"undefined") write:("undefined"'=annotate) "",! Write !,!,"
"_(category_":"_secondary)_" "_($G(description))_"
Table Type"_type_" ("_annotate_")
Values",! Write !,"",! Write ! #Include EnsEDIASTM kill indexed set one="" For { set one=$o($$$vaSchemaGbl(category,"CT",secondary,one)) Quit:one="" set indexed($$$vaSchemaGbl(category,"CT",secondary,one))=one } set i="" For { set i=$o(indexed(i)) Quit:i="" set description=..EscapeHTML($get($$$vaSchemaDescGbl(category,"CT",secondary,indexed(i)))) write "" } Write !,!,"
",$S($C(0)=indexed(i):" ",1:indexed(i)),"",$s(description="":" ",1:description),"
",! Write "
",! Write !,"

",! Write "" Write "(Show All Categories)" Write "" Write "
",! Write "" Write "(Show All Code Tables in Category '"_(category)_"')" Write "" Write !,!,""

Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write !,"<title>Ensemble ASTM Code Table</title>",! Write "<link rel=""stylesheet"" type=""text/css"" href=""/csp/sys/csputils.css"" title=""Standard Style""/>" Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html>" Write ! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write ! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,"</html>"
